--- UPDATE 0.2 ---

Hi,

This game is released for the GDTV GameJam.

This is my very first jam participation and also my first original game released.

It is basically an endless spawn game, where you need to survive and kill monsters in a small room.

I'll post further updates as this is a really EARLY access. More like a demo
